message.name: ERR_REFLECTION_CLASS_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: The class '%1s' was not found during the use of the reflection API for '%2s', within the %3c component.

message.name: ERR_REFLECTION_NO_SUCH_METHOD
message.locale: The method '%1s' was not found during the use of the reflection API for '%2s', within the %3c component.

message.name: ERR_ILLEGAL_FUNCTION_ARGUMENTS
message.locale: The method '%1s' on the class '%2s' within the %3c component was called with illegal arguments.
